channelml.meta:notes: ChannelML description of a channel NMDASyn generated with project: TestNetworkML saved with neuroConstruct v1.2.3 on: 16:35:20, 20-Feb-09

synapse_type.name: NMDASyn
synapse_type.meta:notes: Example of an NMDA receptor synaptic mechanism, based on Maex DeSchutter 1998, Gabbiani et al, 1994. Mappings exist for NEURON and GENESIS.

meta:publication.meta:fullTitle: Gabbiani F, Midtgaard J, Knopfel T. Synaptic integration in a model of cerebellar granule cells.
Maex, R and De Schutter, E. Synchronization of Golgi and Granule Cell Firing in a Detailed Network Model of the cerebellar Granule Cell Layer. J Neurophysiol, Nov 1998; 80: 2521 - 2537
